column4: hi, I'm a little new to ubuntu so if you could bear with me, if I am to install Vista SP1 (I have dual boot), will that stop the grub bootloader from working?
Is vista and ubuntu already installed?
Most likely not. But Vista SP1 is still new and I haven't seen or heard much of ubuntu users upgrading.
I want to do that myself though... has it been released through microsoft update yet?
